name: Browserbase
description: Cloud browser automation using Browserbase and Stagehand. Navigate, click, extract data, and take screenshots in cloud-hosted browsers.

inputs.label: Browserbase API Key
inputs.description: API key for your Browserbase account.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to browserbase.com and create an account
2. Navigate to Settings in the dashboard
3. Copy your API key

inputs.label: Browserbase Project ID
inputs.description: Your Browserbase project ID, found in the dashboard.

obtain.instructions:
1. Log in to browserbase.com
2. Open your project in the dashboard
3. Copy the Project ID from the project settings

inputs.label: Gemini API Key
inputs.description: Google Gemini API key. Required by default (Stagehand uses Gemini 2.0 Flash). Optional if using a custom model via --modelApiKey.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to Google AI Studio
2. Click 'Get API key'
3. Create a new API key or select an existing one
4. Copy the key

auth.instructions: Get your API key and Project ID at https://www.browserbase.com/
